LanguageData.BrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.broken_up_with_: I was just dumped like a load of garbage.
LanguageData.CheatedOnMe.stages.cheated_on_me.label: cheated on me
LanguageData.CheatedOnMeMood.stages.cheated_on_by.des: How could someone cheat on me!
LanguageData.Chitchat.stages.chitchat.label: chitchat
LanguageData.DeepTalk.stages.deep_talk.label: deep talk
LanguageData.DivorcedMe.stages.divorced_me.label: divorced me
LanguageData.DivorcedMeMood.stages.divorced_by.label: divorced by {0}
LanguageData.DivorcedMeMood.stages.divorced_by.descri: We made a commitment, and they just tore it apart.
LanguageData.FailedRomanceAttemptOnMeLowOpinionMood.s: Someone I don't like tried to romance me.
LanguageData.ForcedMeToTakeDrugsMood.stages.forced_to: I'm a teetotaler; I would never take drugs by choice. But I was forced! I feel unclean.
LanguageData.ForcedMeToTakeLuciferiumMood.stages.forc: I'm a body purist; I would never take luciferium by choice. But I was forced! I feel unclean.
LanguageData.GotSomeLovin.stages.got_some_lovin.label: got some lovin'
LanguageData.GotSomeLovin.stages.got_some_lovin.descr: There's nothing like a tumble between the sheets to lift the mood.
LanguageData.HarmedMe.stages.harmed_me.label: harmed me
LanguageData.Insulted.stages.insulted.label: insulted
LanguageData.InsultedMood.stages.insulted.label: insulted
LanguageData.InsultedMood.stages.insulted.description: I've been directly insulted! What an awful person!
LanguageData.KilledMyKin.stages.killed_my_kin.label: killed my kin
LanguageData.KilledMySon.stages.killed_my_son.label: killed my son
LanguageData.KindWords.stages.kind_words.label: kind words
LanguageData.KindWordsMood.stages.kind_words.label: kind words
LanguageData.KindWordsMood.stages.kind_words.descript: I've been bestowed with kind words! What a nice person!
LanguageData.RapportBuilt.stages.rapport_built.label: rapport built
LanguageData.RebuffedMyRomanceAttemptMood.stages.rebu: I attempted to create a romance, but I got the cold shoulder. Feels bad man.
LanguageData.RecruitedMe.stages.recruited_me.label: recruited me
LanguageData.RejectedMyProposalMood.stages.my_proposa: I thought we were meant to marry. But I was just shot down.
LanguageData.RescuedMe.stages.rescued_me.label: rescued me
LanguageData.RescuedMeByOfferingHelp.stages.rescued_m: I was rescued by someone! I almost thought I was done for back there. I'm so thankful.
LanguageData.Slighted.stages.slighted.label: slighted
LanguageData.SoldMyBondedAnimal.stages.bonded_animal_: My special bonded animal was given away!
LanguageData.SoldMyBondedAnimalMood.stages.bonded_ani: My special bonded animal was given away!
LanguageData.SoldMyLovedOne.stages.loved_one_sold.des: Someone I love was sold to a trader like a piece of meat!
